name: JUMPGRID
description:
JUMPGRID is a game about training your muscle memory until you learn to dance with your fingers!Gameplay
You are the pilot of an experimental craft trying to find your way home. Navigate an ever shifting cosmic obstacle course by teleporting instantly to points on the "jump-grid". Each kinetic level takes only a few seconds to complete, but may require numerous attempts to discover the right path and timings.Features
  • Over 100 bite-sized, yet punishing levels
  • Original pulse-pounding soundtrack
  • Speedrun mode and leaderboards
